_xs=uv9AO4g9)8,te}jt.text: how to use 'create button' block:=================================block variablesid - selects the chosen id for cloning a buttonrepeat - repeats the clone process as many times as you want. the id will go up by 1 everytime it repeats=================================adding new buttonscostume and position - add a new 'if (id = x)' block at the start and change it's position and costume'button action - scroll down a bit until you find lots of 'if' blocks under a mouse touching script. add a new 'if (id= x)' block then add an action.

BYft+psa,;,-Uka|UIPe.text: id list=================0 - back1 - play2 - scores3 - help4 - character select5 - easy6 - normal7 - hard8 - reset9 - halloween mode toggle10 - go to char select page 111 - go to char select page 212 - save/load menu13 - save code14 - load code
